title: Neuromorphic Network Learning Design: Understanding Learning-Sleep-Recovery Cycle Models

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of electrical circuits and basic knowledge of biological neural networks
context.additional_context: Utilization of visual materials and simplified experimental simulations for smartphone-based learning. Introduction of neuromorphic computing concepts linked to language learning.

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles of neuromorphic networks, including the roles of silver nanowires and TiO2 structures.
Analyze the impact of learning-sleep-recovery cycles on artificial neural networks using experimental data.
Apply voltage pulse modulation-based memory enhancement mechanisms to language pattern learning models.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
